summary:
Sick of Imperials not having a speech bonus! Bretons not having Enhanced magicka!
Well I say no more! This mod makes an effort to Oblivionize all the Racial skill bonusses and resistances.
descriptionHtml:
============
Description:
============
Sick of Imperials not having a speech bonus?! Bretons not having Enhanced magicka!
Well I say no more! This mod makes an effort to Oblivionize the Racial skill bonusses and resistances.

=================
What have I done:
=================
- I have recreated all Racial Skill Bonusses.
- I added Racial weaknesses and resistances.
- Replaced Skyrim\'s Racial Powers.

==========================
Frequently asked questions:
==========================
Q. Do I need to start a new character?
A. No, the Racial resistances, weaknesses and bonusses all work!

============================
All Mods from this auther:
============================
- Oblivionized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8215
- Morrowindized Racial Skill Bonusses and Resistances:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8670
- Morrowindized Artifacts:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8991
- Caucasian Yokudans aka Greyguards
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16309

===========
Remember:
===========
- Feedback! A mod is only as good as it\'s feedback!
- Put tags on the file that I might have missed. (this will make the file easier to find for others)
- If you like it, Endorse it. (this will tell other people that it is a good mod and it\'s a compliment to me)
- If you love it, Vote for it. (this will tell other people that this is either almost essential or at least something brilliant)

============================================
New Racial Abilities, Powers and Skill Bonusses:
============================================
Altmer(High Elf):
Racial Abilitiy:
- Highborn (+100 Magicka)
- High Elf Elemental Weakness (25% weakness to Fire, Frost and Shock)
- High Elf Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Alteration    +10
- Destruction   +10
- Conjuration   +5
- Alchemy       +5
- Enchanting    +5

Argonian:
Racial Ability:
- Argonian Poison Immunity (100% Poison resistance)
- Argonian Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)
- Waterbreathing

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Lockpicking   +10
- Pickpocket    +10
- Illusion      +5
- Sneak         +5
- Alteration    +5

Bosmer(Wood Elf):
Racial Ability:
- Wood Elf Disease Resistance (75% Disease resistance)
- Beats Tongue (Command Animal)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Archery       +10
- Alchemy       +10
- Sneak         +5
- Pickpocket    +5
- Alteration    +5

Breton:
Racial Ability:
- Dragonskin (Dragonhide spell in the form of a power)
- Enhanced Magicka (+25 Magicka)
- Breton Magic Resistance (50% Magic resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Conjuration   +10
- Alteration    +10
- Restoration   +5
- Illusion      +5
- Alchemy       +5

Dunmer(Dark Elf):
Racial Ability:
- Ancestors Wrath (will be replaced by Ancestor Guardian in the Future)
- Dark Elf Fire Resistance (75% Fire resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Destruction   +10
- One-handed    +10
- Archery       +5
- Alchemy       +5
- Two-handed    +5

Imperial:
Racial Ability:
- Voice of the Emperor (30 point Speech bonus)
- Star of the West (Absorb 100 Stamina)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Speech        +10  
- Heavy Armor   +10
- One-handed    +5
- Two-handed    +5
- Enchanting    +5

Kajiit:
Racial Ability:
- Eye of Fear (Fear)
- Eye of Night (unchanged)
- Claws (Unarmed damage +15)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Sneak         +10
- Lockpicking   +10
- Pickpocket    +5
- Light Armor   +5
- One-handed    +5

Nord:
Racial Ability:
- Nordic Frost (50 Frost damage)
- Woad (Ebonflesh spell in the form of a power)
- Nord Frost Resistance (50% Frost resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Heavy armor   +10
- One-handed    +5
- Two-handed    +5
- Smithing      +5
- Block         +5
- Restoration   +5

Orsimer(Orc):
Racial Ability:
- Beserk (unchanged)
- Orc Magic Resistance (25% Magic resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- Heavy Armor   +10
- Smithing      +10
- Two-handed    +5
- One-handed    +5
- Block         +5

Redguard:
Racial Ability:
- Adreneline Rush (will be replaced by more Oblivionized version)
- Redguard Resistance (75% Disease and Poison resistance)

Racial Skill Bonusses:
- One-handed    +10
- Two-handed    +5
- Heavy Armor   +5
- Light Armor   +5
- Speech        +5
- Smithing      +5

===============
Version history:
===============
1.2:
Vampire Races have same bonusses AND powers as the non-vampire races!
High Elves extra magic from 50 to 100.

1.1:
Replaced all Skyrim Racial Powers with Oblivionized ones, 
except for Ancestor Guardian(future update) and Adrenaline Rush(future update).

1.0:
All racial skill bonusses and resistances Oblivionized. 
Original Skyrim racial Powers are unchanged.

==================
Recommended mods:
==================
If you like like this mod the i highly recommend:
- Ancient Spells - Morrowind and Oblivion Spells
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9153

==============
Special Thanks:
==============
QuitWhistler: Logo design
EvilPhoenix: Testing
author: coenve
